description: Number of partitions in expanding space.
comments: Also partitions of n into 1 sort of 1, 4 sorts of 2, 27 sorts of 3, ..., k^k sorts of k. - _Joerg Arndt_, Feb 04 2015
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..300
formula: G.f.: 1 / product_{k>=1} (1 - x^k)^(k^k).a(n) ~ n^n * (1 + exp(-1)/n + (exp(-1)/2 + 5*exp(-2))/n^2). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Mar 14 2015
maple: with(numtheory):a:= proc(n) option remember; `if`(n=0, 1, add(      add(d*d^d, d=divisors(j)) *a(n-j), j=1..n)/n)    end:seq(a(n), n=0..30);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, Feb 04 2015
author: _Olivier GÃ©rard_
